import confetti from'canvas-confetti';export var runFireworks=function runFireworks(){var duration=5*1000;var animationEnd=Date.now()+duration;var defaults={startVelocity:30,spread:360,ticks:60,zIndex:0};function randomInRange(min,max){return Math.random()*(max-min)+min;}var interval=setInterval(function(){var timeLeft=animationEnd-Date.now();if(timeLeft<=0){return clearInterval(interval);}var particleCount=50*(timeLeft/duration);// since particles fall down, start a bit higher than random
confetti(Object.assign({},defaults,{particleCount:particleCount,origin:{x:randomInRange(0.1,0.3),y:Math.random()-0.2}}));confetti(Object.assign({},defaults,{particleCount:particleCount,origin:{x:randomInRange(0.7,0.9),y:Math.random()-0.2}}));},250);};
